00001 /*********************************************************
00002  * Pmsg for assignments in the Databases course INF-2700 *
00003  * UIT - The Arctic University of Norway                 *
00004  * Author: Weihai Yu                                     *
00005  *********************************************************/
00006 
00007 #include "pmsg.h"
00008 #include <stdio.h>
00009 #include <stdarg.h>
00010 
00011 extern pmsg_level msglevel; /* the higher, the more messages... */
00012 
00013 void put_msg(pmsg_level level, char* format, ...) {
00014   va_list args;
00015 
00016   if (level>msglevel)
00017     return;
00018 
00019   va_start(args, format);
00020   switch (level)
00021     {
00022     case FATAL: fprintf(stderr, "FATAL: "); break;
00023     case ERROR: fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: "); break;
00024     case WARN:  fprintf(stderr, "WARN:  "); break;
00025     case INFO:  fprintf(stderr, "INFO:  "); break;
00026     case DEBUG: fprintf(stderr, "DEBUG: "); break;
00027     case FORCE: break;
00028     }
00029 
00030   vfprintf(stderr, format, args);
00031   va_end(args);
00032 }
00033 
00034 
00035 void append_msg(pmsg_level level, char* format, ...) {
00036   va_list args;
00037 
00038   if (level>msglevel)
00039     return;
00040 
00041   va_start(args, format);
00042   vfprintf(stderr, format, args);
00043   va_end(args);
00044 }
